29.27. [Hrabanus Maurus] Expositio super epistolae Pauli Lib. I-XXIX.
Exposition | Pauline Epistles
Manuscripts:
1. Berlin, Staatsbibliothek Lat. 2o 759 (Gôrres 97), f. 69-115. saec. ixin; P: Trier, St. Maximin. Part of Hebrews.
2. Bielefeld, Landeskirchlisches Archiv 19816/a 11-02. 1 leaf. saec. ix3/4; O: Fulda. Text from Galatians.
3. Cambridge, Pembroke College 308. saec. ix. Reims. (S)
4. Munich, Bayerische Staatsbibliothek Clm 8108. 76 fol. saec. ixmed. Romans (lib. V-VIII). (S)
5. Munich, Univeritätsbibliothek 2o 34 (Cim. 6), f. 2v-100. saec. ix2; O: Lyon area.
6. Oxford, Bodleian, Laud Misc. 106 [717]. saec. ix; O: Würzburg..
7. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 17177, f. 5-8: frag. ad II Tim.; f. 8: frag. ad Philem.
8. Paris, Bibliothèque Sainte-Geneviève 1370, f. 37-55. saec. xii-xiii. Romans interpolated with Jerome and Augustine.
9. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica lat. 340. 2 leaves. saec. ix.
10. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Urb. Lat. 2, f. 250. Saec. xv. General prologue.
11. Wolfenbüttel, Herzog August Bibliothek 4123 (Weissenburg 39). saec.ixmed. 222 ff.
